Name: Indie Dream
About the game: A friendly note - The game contains English as a selectable language, but the translation is not fully completed yet. Untranslated part are temporarily replaced by machine translation. 'Make indie games inside an indie game' Summary This is a story about a young and naive indie developer. The protagonist is a person who have a dream of publishing his own game. Just like many other newbee developers, he tries to master those skills needed for developing. In addition, he will need to figure out how the world of gamers works. Is him simple and naive enough to have an indie dream? Game This is an interactive story driven game. Your main goal is to develop indie games inside this indie game. The protagonistâ€™s experience will be revealed within the combination of story-telling and interactive minigames. Features Act as an indie developer. Simulate the process of developing with interactions and minigames. Wandering and wondering, pushing forward. Some parts of the story are based on personal experiences. Other This is a personal game. The problems and difficulties encountered during developing this game are also a part of the game itself. Just relax yourself in this interactive story. Estimated play time: A bit longer than a movie.
